Dieses Kapitel gibt einen Überblick über: This chapter gives an overview of the commands that can be used to control Vishnu via mouse and keyboard.
woher der Name: where does the name come from
Anwender-Module sind die Programme, die: User modules are the programs that represent your business processes or monitor them.
Vishnu setzt Ihren logischen Ausdruck (L: Vishnu converts your logical expression (LogicalExpression, see also ) internally into a corresponding tree structure (Tree), which is processed logically and which you will ultimately find in the normal display ("Logical Task Tree").
Vishnu bietet eine globale Parametererse: Vishnu offers global parameter replacement. This means that all parameter names in strings of transfer parameters are replaced by their runtime values, if possible. This chapter describes how this works in detail.
Hier finden Sie weiterführende Informati: Here you will find further information.
In diesem Bereich werden alle Vishnu-Unz: In this section, all Vishnu shortcomings are collected and organized according to subjective criteria.
Vishnu generiert und verarbeitet alle we: Vishnu generates and processes all significant events within the tree as TreeEvents. This chapter explains which TreeEvents are available and how you can work with them.
Hier finden Sie bisherige Überlegungen o: Here you will find previous considerations or plans for the further development of Vishnu. There is no consistent prioritization.
Dieses Kapitel handelt von selbst erstel: This chapter is about self-created loggers. You can use your own loggers to process TreeEvents in the Vishnu tree according to your requirements and write them to a log file.
Das Vishnu-Kontextmenü stellt verschiede: The Vishnu context menu provides various functions, some of which are additional (see below). It is called up using the right mouse button.
Snapshots sind Momentaufnahmen der Verar: Snapshots are snapshots of the processing in a Vishnu job. These snapshots can be displayed in another Vishnu program as part of its job, as if they belonged to it directly.
Vishnu startet direkt nach der Erstinsta: Vishnu starts with a demo job immediately after the initial installation. We will now take a closer look at this (in a simplified version).
In diesem Abschnitt werden echte Fehler: This section lists genuine errors or shortcomings. There is no consistent prioritization.
Dieses Kapitel gibt einen Überblick über: This chapter provides an overview of the commands that can be used to control Vishnu via mouse and keyboard.
Dieses Kapitel befasst sich mit besonder: This chapter deals with special, self-created view dlls. You can use your own views to extend and change the display of checkers and their check results in Vishnu in almost any way you like.
Hier können die Änderungen in den versch: The changes in the various Vishnu versions can be viewed here.
Liste der für den schnellen Einstieg int: List of pages of interest for a quick start
Die Datei Vishnu.exe.config.user ist die: The Vishnu.exe.config.user file is the central location for your own Vishnu settings. Here you will find some preset parameters. You can change these, but also add your own. You will find the Vishnu.exe.config.
Dieses Kapitel handelt von selbst erstel: This chapter is about self-created checker dlls. You can use your own checkers to monitor any processes or statuses that only you can know.
Trigger und Logger sind in der Regel ano: Triggers and loggers are usually anonymous, as they are assigned directly to a job or checker. This eliminates the need for them to be addressable via a LogicalName.
Vishnu is a modular system for monitorin: Vishnu is a modular system for monitoring and process control with integrated processing of extended logical expressions.
Dieses Kapitel handelt von selbst erstel: This chapter is about self-created ValueModifiers.
Hier finden Sie Details zu verschiedenen: Here you will find details on various Vishnu elements. In addition to general function descriptions, parameterization and return values are also addressed and illustrated using XML examples.
Dieses Kapitel handelt von selbst erstel: This chapter is about self-created triggers. You can use your own triggers to restart checkers in the Vishnu tree depending on events in your business processes.
Mehrere Jobs können in einer einzigen Jo: Several jobs can be combined in a single JobDescription.xml. Below you can see the simplified demo job from the chapter in the inline version.
Das Verhalten von Vishnu kann über diver: The behavior of Vishnu can be set using various parameters. These parameters can be specified via the command line when Vishnu is called, but they can also be set via the , the environment or the registry.
Auch wenn Vishnu open source und frei is: Even though Vishnu is open source and free, the development costs a lot of time and work and, last but not least, the hosting of the documentation, among other things, also costs money.
